Oat

An ultra-lightweight HTML + CSS + minimal JS, semantic UI component library with zero dependencies. No framework or build or dev dependencies of any kind. Just include the tiny CSS and JS bundles.

Semantic tags and attributes are styled contextually out of the box without classes, thereby forcing best practices. A few dynamic components are WebComponents.


Browse components Get started

Lightweight

~00KB CSS, ~00KB JS minified + gzipped.

Zero dependencies

Fully-standalone with no dependencies on any JS or CSS frameworks. No framework or library bloat. No dependencies on the messy NodeJS ecosystem.

Semantic HTML

Native elements like <button>, <input>, <dialog> and semantic attributes like role="button" are styled directly. No classes.

Accessibility

Semantic HTML and ARIA roles are used (and forced in many places) throughout. Full keyboard navigation support for all components and elements.

Themes

Easily customize the overall theme using CSS custom properties. data-theme="dark" on body automatically uses the bundled dark theme.
